item.title: Emergency vehicles by Egon v1.2 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 15, 2025

Emergency vehicles by Egon v1.2 ETS2

Currently there are emergency vehicles for these countries:
Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Russia, Slovakia, Sweden and United Kingdom

All vehicles are active in road events, and have working emergency lights – most of them have custom LED lightbars and additional lights. Mod allows accidents scenes for countries that didn’t have ambulances, and allows customs road events for France.

Mod disables these vehicles from traffic:
– German and Luxembourg police car VW Passat CC disabled from traffic.
– Hungarian and Russian police car Ford Focus disabled from traffic.

Update:
New vehicles:

AUSTRIA
– Police car VW Transporter T6

ITALY
– Highway police Skoda Superb Combi /Polizia Stradale/
– Carabinieri Jeep Renegade

LITHUANIA
– Police car Seat Leon ST

NETHERLANDS
– Police car VW Transporter T6

POLAND
– Police car VW Transporter T6

SPAIN
– National police Peugeot 2008 /Policía Nacional/
– Roads policing unit Renault Talisman /Guardia Civil Tráfico/

Changes and fixes:
– Fixed LOD model for Belgium’s police Audi A3.
– Changed lightbars for Czech and Hungarian ambulances – both now feature combo of red and blue light as they should.
– Edited lightbars for other ambulances based on VW Crafter – turned main lightbar to LED one.
– Italian state police cars /Alfa Romeo Giulietta and Fiat Panda/ are now limited to Italian cities only, as they do not roam highways irl, and country roads are under control of Carabinieri.
Highway police may still spawn outside of highways as there is no way to limit them to highways only in the game.

Credits: Egon

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Peterbilt 351 v1.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 15, 2025

Peterbilt 351 v1.1 ATS

Peterbilt’s lightweight model 351 was a worthy successor to the model 350, offering shorter wheelbases and more optimized weight distribution. The difference in sales numbers is very telling, with over 7000 351’s being sold 1954-1976 vs 847 350’s 1949-1957. It’s fairly safe to say that the 351 was the model that really drove Peterbilt conventionals to the success they continue to enjoy.

This mod seeks to recapture some of the magic of this pivotal truck model, including one of its iconic movie appearances!

V1.1
– added single axle (281) chassis option and related accessories
– changed front frame cutoff
– added reverse t-bar type rear bumper for use with fiberglass fenders
– event reward support up to 1.55/Iowa

Credits: Smarty

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SibirMap – AltaiMap RC v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 15, 2025

SibirMap – AltaiMap RC v1.0 ETS2

SibirMap (2.11) – AltaiMap (1.7.2) Road Connection — connects two mods with a simple road.
It is intended for two versions of the map of SibirMap – FREE (FV) and SUPPORT (SV)

item.title: MB ATEGO R.C.MOD v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 15, 2025

MB ATEGO R.C.MOD v1.0 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz Atego is a range of general-purpose rigid trucks introduced by Daimler Truck in 1998. A new model was introduced in 2004, followed by a facelift in 2010 and another new model in 2013. The latest version is available in gross vehicle weights of 6.5 to 16 tonnes (t) and is powered by a straight 4- or 6-cylinder engine.

Features Truck:
– Template Support
– Special Plate Support
– Cabin Accesory
– 2 Cabins: short and long
– 6×2-4×2 Chassis
– 2 Engines: OM936La 238 and 295 hp;
– 3 Gearboxes for 6, 8 and 12 steps;
– 2 Different Steering Wheels
– Paintable Parts
– 3 Different Grille
– Painted And Plastic Bumpers
– Many Slot Parts
– 2 Transmission Option With Real Ratios
– Own Load
– Real Interior
– Ao baked
– Fps Friendly
– Quality Textures
– Trailer: 1 curtain-sided, 2 refrigerators, 1 platform, 1 flatbed.

Credits: rc mods

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
